game.name: Elementalist
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A puzzle platformer where you collect Elements and use their powers to move around in various ways. Each Element you collect becomes the next one you use, so pay attention to the order!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A puzzle platformer where you collect Elements and use their powers to move around in various ways. Each Element you collect becomes the next one you use, so pay attention to the order!
